channel.title: Test on Curiosity432 Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Test on Curiosity432 Blog

item.title: Test markdown
item.description: This blog is writing using the web static generator framewrok HUGO. It converts the articles writted in markdown format to an HTML web page. The markdown format is simple, here is a test: To add metadata we have to use YAML that refers to te config file. --- author: "Testing" title: "Test markdown" date: "2021-01-01" tags: ["Test"] categories: ["Blog"] comments: false ShowToc: true TocOpen: true lang: en --- Text with format Titles # H1 Heading ## H2 Heading ### H3 Heading #### H4 Heading #### H5 Heading ##### H6 Heading ###### H7 Heading H1 Heading H2 Heading H3 Heading H4 Heading H5 Heading H6 Heading H7 Heading Type of font *Italicized text*, **bold text**, ***italicized and bold***.
